name: Kids Dream
description:
Hi,

This game is about a kid dream, being the knight fighting the other kid for the glory !

To do so, you must use your snow sword to vanquish your opponent ... A snow Sword and use your shield to protect yourself

If any enemies touches you, you get freeze.

Your snow sword get destroyed after every hit and need to be rebuild.

Control :

ZQSD = movement

LeftClick = Attack

R = Rebuild Sword (It take some time to rebuild the sword, you must keep pressing until animation ends)

RightClick = Defend (You need to maintain the button)

Shift = Sprint

Space = Jump

Let you have a childish moment in your adult life :)

Merry Christmas !

This game was made by Eric Tran, Frederic YE
